   20: -module(jinterface_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, 
   23: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   25: 
   26: -export([generic_transport_factory/1, transport_factory/1,
   27: 	 nodename/1, register_and_whereis/1, get_names/1, boolean_atom/1,
   28: 	 node_ping/1, mbox_ping/1,
   29: 	 java_erlang_send_receive/1,
   30: 	 java_internal_send_receive_same_node/1,
   31: 	 java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes/1,
   32: 	 java_internal_send_receive_self/1,
   33: 	 java_link_and_exit/1, erl_link_and_exit/1,
   34:          erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit/1,
   35:          erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit/1,
   36:          simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink/1,
   37:          simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link/1,
   38: 	 erl_link_java_exit/1,
   39:          java_link_erl_exit/1,
   40: 	 internal_link_linking_exits/1, internal_link_linked_exits/1,
   41: 	 internal_unlink_linking_exits/1, internal_unlink_linked_exits/1,
   42: 	 normal_exit/1, kill_mbox/1,kill_erl_proc_from_java/1,
   43: 	 kill_mbox_from_erlang/1,
   44: 	 erl_exit_with_reason_any_term/1,
   45: 	 java_exit_with_reason_any_term/1,
   46: 	 status_handler_localStatus/1, status_handler_remoteStatus/1,
   47: 	 status_handler_connAttempt/1,
   48: 	 maps/1,
   49: 	 fun_equals/1,
   50: 	 core_match_bind/1
   51:      ]).
   52: 
   53: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   54: 
   55: -define(debug,true).
   56: -ifdef(debug).
   57: -define(dbg(Str,Args), io:format(Str,Args)).
   58: -else.
   59: -define(dbg(Str,Args), ok).
   60: -endif.
   61: 
   62: -define(link_test_reason,link_test_reason).
   63: 
   64: %% Test cases in MboxSendReceive.java
   65: -define(java_erlang_send_receive,1).
   66: -define(java_internal_send_receive_same_node,2).
   67: -define(java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes,3).
   68: -define(java_internal_send_receive_self,4).
   69: 
   70: %% Test cases in MboxLinkUnlink.java
   71: -define(java_link_and_exit, 1).
   72: -define(erl_link_and_exit, 2).
   73: -define(erl_link_java_exit, 3).
   74: -define(java_link_erl_exit, 4).
   75: -define(internal_link_linking_exits, 5).
   76: -define(internal_link_linked_exits, 6).
   77: -define(internal_unlink_linking_exits,7).
   78: -define(internal_unlink_linked_exits,8).
   79: -define(normal_exit,9).
   80: -define(kill_mbox,10).
   81: -define(kill_erl_proc_from_java,11).
   82: -define(kill_mbox_from_erlang,12).
   83: -define(erl_exit_with_reason_any_term,13).
   84: -define(java_exit_with_reason_any_term,14).
   85: -define(erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit, 15).
   86: -define(erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit, 16).
   87: -define(simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink, 17).
   88: -define(simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link, 18).
   89: 
   90: 
   91: %% Test cases in NodeStatusHandler.java
   92: -define(status_handler_localStatus,1).
   93: -define(status_handler_remoteStatus,2).
   94: -define(status_handler_connAttempt,3).
   95: 
   96: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   97: %%% INIT/END
   98: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   99: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
  100: 
  101: all() -> 
  102:     lists:append([fundamental(), ping(), send_receive(),
  103: 		  link_unlink(), status_handler()]).
  104: 
  105: groups() -> 
  106:     [].
  107: 
  108: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  112:     Config.
  113: 
  114: 
  115: fundamental() ->
  116:     [
  117:      generic_transport_factory, % GenericTransportFactoryTest.java
  118:      transport_factory,         % TransportFactoryTest.java
  119:      nodename,                  % Nodename.java
  120:      register_and_whereis,      % RegisterAndWhereis.java
  121:      get_names,                 % GetNames.java
  122:      boolean_atom,              % BooleanAtom.java
  123:      maps,                      % Maps.java
  124:      fun_equals,                % FunEquals.java
  125:      core_match_bind            % CoreMatchBind.java
  126:     ].
  127: 
  128: ping() ->
  129:     [
  130:      %% Implemented in NodePing.java
  131:      node_ping,
  132: 
  133:      %% Implemented in MboxPing.java
  134:      mbox_ping
  135:      ].
  136: 
  137: 
  138: send_receive() ->
  139:     [
  140:      %% Implemented in MboxSendReceive.java
  141:      java_erlang_send_receive,
  142:      java_internal_send_receive_same_node,
  143:      java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes,
  144:      java_internal_send_receive_self
  145:     ].
  146: 
  147: %% Note:
  148: %%
  149: %% The test cases in MboxLinkUnlink.java and in
  150: %% NodePing.java, all uses default cookie, and if there
  151: %% is a problem with having the same default cookie in
  152: %% erlang vs jinterface, e.g because the home directory
  153: %% does not get the same in some cases on Windows
  154: %% - they will all fail.
  155: 
  156: link_unlink() ->
  157:     [
  158:      %% Implemented in MboxLinkUnlink.java
  159:      java_link_and_exit,
  160:      erl_link_and_exit,
  161:      erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit,
  162:      erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit,
  163:      simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink,
  164:      simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link,
  165:      erl_link_java_exit,
  166:      java_link_erl_exit,
  167:      internal_link_linking_exits,
  168:      internal_link_linked_exits,
  169:      internal_unlink_linking_exits,
  170:      internal_unlink_linked_exits,
  171:      normal_exit,
  172:      kill_mbox,
  173:      kill_erl_proc_from_java,
  174:      kill_mbox_from_erlang,
  175:      erl_exit_with_reason_any_term,
  176:      java_exit_with_reason_any_term
  177:     ].
  178: 
  179: status_handler() ->
  180:     [
  181:      %% Implemented in NodeStatusHandler.java
  182:      status_handler_localStatus,
  183:      status_handler_remoteStatus,
  184:      status_handler_connAttempt
  185:     ].
  186: 
  187: 
  188: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  189:     %% Trigger usage of large pids and ports in 64-bit case...
  190:     case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
  191:         4 ->
  192:             ok;
  193:         8 ->
  194:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,true),
  195:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_pid, 1 bsl 32),
  196:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_port, 1 bsl 32),
  197:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,false),
  198:             ok
  199:     end,
  200: 
  201:     case case code:priv_dir(jinterface) of
  202: 	     {error,bad_name} -> false;
  203: 	     P -> filelib:is_dir(P) end of
  204: 	true ->
  205:             case hostname_resolves() of
  206:                 true ->
  207:                     jitu:init_all(Config);
  208:                 Skip ->
  209:                     Skip
  210:             end;
  211: 	false ->
  212: 	    {skip,"No jinterface application"}
  213:     end.
  214: 
  215: %% Check if inet:gethostname() can be resolved by
  216: %% the native resolver. If it can, we know that
  217: %% jinterface name resolution works. If it cannot
  218: %% jinterface tests will fail.
  219: hostname_resolves() ->
  220:     {ok, HN} = inet:gethostname(),
  221:     case inet_gethost_native:gethostbyname(HN) of
  222:         {ok, _} ->
  223:             true;
  224:         _ ->
  225:             {skip, "Cannot resolve short hostname, add " ++ HN ++ " to /etc/hosts"}
  226:     end.
  227: 
  228: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229:     jitu:finish_all(Config).
  230: 
  231: init_per_testcase(Case, _Config) 
  232:   when Case =:= kill_mbox;
  233:        Case =:= kill_mbox_from_erlang ->
  234:     {skip, "Not yet implemented"};
  235: init_per_testcase(_Case,Config) ->
  236:     Dog = test_server:timetrap({seconds,30}),
  237:     [{watch_dog,Dog}|Config].
  238: 
  239: end_per_testcase(_Case,Config) ->
  240:     case whereis(erl_link_server) of
  241: 	undefined -> ok;
  242: 	Pid -> exit(Pid,kill)
  243:     end,
  244:     jitu:kill_all_jnodes(),
  245:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(?config(watch_dog,Config)),
  246:     ok.
  247: 
  248: 
  249: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  250: %%% TEST CASES
  251: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  252: generic_transport_factory(doc) ->
  253:     ["GenericTransportFactoryTest.java: "
  254:      "Test custom OTP Generic Transport Factory"];
  255: generic_transport_factory(suite) ->
  256:     [];
  257: generic_transport_factory(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  258:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  259: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  260: 		   "GenericTransportFactoryTest").
  261: 
  262: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  263: transport_factory(doc) ->
  264:     ["TransportFactoryTest.java: Test custom OTP Transport Factory"];
  265: transport_factory(suite) ->
  266:     [];
  267: transport_factory(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  269: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  270: 		   "TransportFactoryTest").
  271: 
  272: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  273: nodename(doc) ->
  274:     ["Nodename.java: "
  275:      "Test OtpNode.node(), OtpNode.alive() and OtpNode.host()"];
  276: nodename(suite) ->
  277:     [];
  278: nodename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     [_,Host] = string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()),"@"),
  280:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  281: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  282: 		   "Nodename",
  283: 		   [list_to_atom(Host)]).
  284: 
  285: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------

  293:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),

  295: 		   "RegisterAndWhereis",
  296: 		   []).
  297:

  345: 
  346: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  347: java_erlang_send_receive(doc) ->
  348:     ["Test sending/receiving of erlang messages between erlang and java"];
  349: java_erlang_send_receive(suite) ->
  350:     [];
  351: java_erlang_send_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  352:     send_receive(?java_erlang_send_receive, fun echo_loop/0, Config).
  353: 
  354: echo_loop() ->
  355:     receive
  356: 	{From,Msg} ->
  357: 	    ?dbg("erl_send_receive_server received ~p",[{From,Msg}]),
  358: 	    ?dbg("erl_send_receive_server sending ~p",[Msg]),
  359: 	    From ! Msg,
  360: 	    echo_loop();
  361: 	done ->
  362: 	    ok
  363:     end.
  364: 
  365: 
  366: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  367: java_internal_send_receive_same_node(doc) ->
  368:     ["MboxSendReceive.java: "
  369:      "Test sending/receiving of erlang messages between mboxes "
  370:      "on the same java node."];
  371: java_internal_send_receive_same_node(suite) ->
  372:     [];
  373: java_internal_send_receive_same_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  374:     send_receive(?java_internal_send_receive_same_node,
  375: 		 fun() -> receive done -> ok end end,
  376: 		 Config).
  377: 
  378: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  379: java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes(doc) ->
  380:     ["MboxSendReceive.java: "
  381:      "Test sending/receiving of erlang messages between mboxes "
  382:      "on different java nodes."];
  383: java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes(suite) ->
  384:     [];
  385: java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     send_receive(?java_internal_send_receive_different_nodes,
  387: 		 fun() -> receive done -> ok end end,
  388: 		 Config).
  389: 
  390: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------

  392:     ["MboxSendReceive.java: "
  393:      "Test sending/receiving of erlang messages from an mbox to itself"];
  394: java_internal_send_receive_self(suite) ->
  395:     [];
  396: java_internal_send_receive_self(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  397:     send_receive(?java_internal_send_receive_self,
  398: 		 fun() -> receive done -> ok end end,
  399: 		 Config).
  400: 
  401: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  402: java_link_and_exit(doc) ->
  403:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  404:      "Test link between erlang process and java mailbox."
  405:      "Java mailbox links and exits"];
  406: java_link_and_exit(suite) ->
  407:     [];
  408: java_link_and_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  409:     LinkFun =
  410: 	fun(Mbox) ->
  411: 		Mbox ! {?java_link_and_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  412: 		receive after infinity -> ok end
  413: 	end,
  414:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,java_link_and_exit,Config).
  415: 
  416: 
  417: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  418: erl_link_and_exit(doc) ->
  419:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  420:      "Test link between erlang process and java mailbox."
  421:      "Erlang process links and exits"];
  422: erl_link_and_exit(suite) ->
  423:     [];
  424: erl_link_and_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  426: 		      link(Mbox),
  427: 		      Mbox ! {?erl_link_and_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  428: 		      receive ok -> ok end,
  429: 		      exit(?link_test_reason)
  430: 	      end,
  431:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,erl_link_and_exit,Config).
  432: 
  433: erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  434:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  435: 		      link(Mbox),
  436:                       unlink(Mbox),
  437:                       link(Mbox),
  438: 		      Mbox ! {?erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  439: 		      receive ok -> ok end,
  440: 		      exit(?link_test_reason)
  441: 	      end,
  442:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,erl_link_unlink_link_and_exit,Config).
  443: 
  444: erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  445:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  446: 		      link(Mbox),
  447: 		      Mbox ! {?erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  448: 		      receive ok -> ok end,
  449: 		      exit(?link_test_reason)
  450: 	      end,
  451:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,erl_link_java_unlink_link_and_exit,Config).
  452: 
  453: simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  455:                       GoTime = os:system_time(millisecond) + 500,
  456: 		      Mbox ! {?simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink, self(), GoTime},
  457:                       spin_wait_until(fun () ->
  458:                                               os:system_time(millisecond) >= GoTime
  459:                                       end),
  460:                       link(Mbox),
  461:                       receive check_link -> ok end,
  462:                       %% We now know the unlink should have reached us and we
  463:                       %% should have sent the unlink ack...
  464:                       Mbox ! check_link,
  465:                       {links, Links} = process_info(self(), links),
  466:                       Expect = case lists:member(Mbox, Links) of
  467:                                    true -> linked;
  468:                                    false -> not_linked
  469:                                end,
  470:                       io:format("Expect = ~p~n", [Expect]),
  471:                       receive
  472:                           MboxResult ->
  473:                               MboxResult = Expect
  474:                       end,
  475: 		      exit(?link_test_reason)
  476: 	      end,
  477:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,simultaneous_erl_link_java_link_unlink,Config).
  478:     
  479: simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  480:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  481:                       GoTime = os:system_time(millisecond) + 500,
  482: 		      Mbox ! {?simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link, self(), GoTime},
  483:                       spin_wait_until(fun () ->
  484:                                               os:system_time(millisecond) >= GoTime
  485:                                       end),
  486:                       link(Mbox),
  487:                       unlink(Mbox),
  488:                       Mbox ! check_link,
  489:                       receive check_link -> ok end,
  490:                       {links, Links} = process_info(self(), links),
  491:                       Expect = case lists:member(Mbox, Links) of
  492:                                    true -> linked;
  493:                                    false -> not_linked
  494:                                end,
  495:                       io:format("Expect = ~p~n", [Expect]),
  496:                       receive
  497:                           MboxResult ->
  498:                               MboxResult = Expect
  499:                       end,
  500: 		      exit(?link_test_reason)
  501: 	      end,
  502:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,simultaneous_erl_link_unlink_java_link,Config).
  503:     
  504: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  505: erl_link_java_exit(doc) ->
  506:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  507:      "Test link between erlang process and java mailbox."
  508:      "Erlang process links and java mailbox exits"];
  509: erl_link_java_exit(suite) ->
  510:     [];
  511: erl_link_java_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  512:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  513: 		      link(Mbox),
  514: 		      Mbox ! {?erl_link_java_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  515: 		      receive after infinity -> ok end
  516: 	      end,
  517:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,erl_link_java_exit,Config).
  518: 
  519: 
  520: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  521: java_link_erl_exit(doc) ->
  522:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  523:      "Test link between erlang process and java mailbox."
  524:      "Java mailbox links and erlang process exits"];
  525: java_link_erl_exit(suite) ->
  526:     [];
  527: java_link_erl_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     LinkFun =
  529: 	fun(Mbox) ->
  530: 		Mbox ! {?java_link_erl_exit,self(),?link_test_reason},
  531: 		receive ok -> ok end,
  532: 		exit(?link_test_reason)
  533: 	end,
  534:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,java_link_erl_exit,Config).
  535: 
  536: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  537: internal_link_linking_exits(doc) ->
  538:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  539:      "Test link between two java mailboxes."
  540:      "The mailbox which creates the link is the one exiting"];
  541: internal_link_linking_exits(suite) ->
  542:     [];
  543: internal_link_linking_exits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  544:      internal_link_unlink(?internal_link_linking_exits,
  545: 			  internal_link_linking_exits,
  546: 			  Config).
  547: 
  548: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  549: internal_link_linked_exits(doc) ->
  550:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  551:      "Test link between two java mailboxes."
  552:      "The mailbox which dies not create the link is the one exiting"];
  553: internal_link_linked_exits(suite) ->
  554:     [];
  555: internal_link_linked_exits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  556:     internal_link_unlink(?internal_link_linked_exits,
  557: 			 internal_link_linked_exits,
  558: 			 Config).
  559: 
  560: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  561: internal_unlink_linking_exits(doc) ->
  562:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  563:      "Test link and unlink between two java mailboxes. "
  564:      "Mailbox1 creates a link to mailbox2 and removes it. "
  565:      "Then it creates another link and mailbox2 removes is. "
  566:      "Finally mailbox1 exits - mailbox2 must survive"];
  567: internal_unlink_linking_exits(suite) ->
  568:     [];
  569: internal_unlink_linking_exits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  570:      internal_link_unlink(?internal_unlink_linking_exits,
  571: 			  internal_unlink_linking_exits,
  572: 			  Config).
  573:

  578:      "Mailbox1 creates a link to mailbox2 and removes it. "
  579:      "Then it creates another link and mailbox2 removes is. "

  585: 			 internal_unlink_linked_exits,

  588: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  589: normal_exit(doc) ->
  590:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  591:      "Test that mbox.close() uses exit reason 'normal', i.e. "
  592:      "that linked processes are not terminated."];
  593: normal_exit(suite) ->
  594:     [];
  595: normal_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  596:     Fun =
  597: 	fun() ->
  598: 		register(erl_link_server,self()),
  599: 		process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  600: 		receive
  601: 		    {Main,Mbox} when is_pid(Main), is_pid(Mbox) ->
  602: 			?dbg("Erlang sending \"~p\"",[normal_exit]),
  603: 			link(Mbox),
  604: 			Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  605: 						 link(Mbox),
  606: 						 Mbox ! {?normal_exit},
  607: 						 receive after infinity -> ok end
  608: 					 end),
  609: 			receive
  610: 			    {'EXIT',Mbox,normal} ->
  611: 				%% Make sure that we don't get the
  612: 				%% exit signal from Pid, and Pid
  613: 				%% should still be alive.
  614: 				receive
  615: 				    {'EXIT',Pid,Reason} ->
  616: 					?dbg("Got unexpected exit signal: ~p",
  617: 					     [{'EXIT',Pid,Reason}]),
  618: 					exit({unexpected,{'EXIT',Pid,Reason}})
  619: 				after 500 ->
  620: 					true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  621: 					exit(Pid,kill)
  622: 				end,
  623: 				receive done -> Main ! done end
  624: 			after 1000 ->
  625: 				receive
  626: 				    Other ->
  627: 					?dbg("Got garbage when waiting for exit:"
  628: 					     " ~p", [Other]),
  629: 					Main ! done,
  630: 					exit({got_unexpected,Other})
  631: 				after 0 ->
  632: 					ok
  633: 				end
  634: 			end;
  635: 		    Other ->
  636: 			?dbg("Got garbage: ~p",[Other]),
  637: 			exit(Other)
  638: 		end
  639: 	end,
  640: 
  641:     spawn_link(Fun),
  642:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  643: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  644: 		   "MboxLinkUnlink",
  645: 		   [erlang:get_cookie(),node()]).
  646: 
  647: 
  648: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  649: kill_mbox(doc) ->
  650:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  651:      "Test that mbox.exit(new OtpErlangAtom(\"kill\") causes linked "
  652:      "processes to exit with reason 'killed', which can be trapped."];
  653: kill_mbox(suite) ->
  654:     {skip, "Not yet implemented"};
  655: kill_mbox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  656:     Fun =
  657: 	fun() ->
  658: 		register(erl_link_server,self()),
  659: 		process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  660: 		receive
  661: 		    {Main,Mbox} when is_pid(Main), is_pid(Mbox) ->
  662: 			?dbg("Erlang sending \"~p\"",[kill_mbox]),
  663: 			Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  664: 						 process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  665: 						 link(Mbox),
  666: 						 Mbox ! {?kill_mbox},
  667: 						 receive
  668: 						     {'EXIT',Mbox,killed} ->
  669: 							 exit(correct_reason);
  670: 						     {'EXIT',Mbox,R} ->
  671: 							 exit({faulty_reason,R})
  672: 						 end
  673: 					 end),
  674: 			receive
  675: 			    {'EXIT',Pid,{faulty_reason,Reason}} ->
  676: 				receive done -> Main ! done end,
  677: 				exit({faulty_reason,Reason});
  678: 			    {'EXIT',Pid,im_killed} ->
  679: 				receive done -> Main ! done end
  680: 			after 1000 ->
  681: 				receive
  682: 				    Other ->
  683: 					?dbg("Got garbage when waiting for exit:"
  684: 					     " ~p", [Other]),
  685: 					Main ! done,
  686: 					exit({got_unexpected,Other})
  687: 				after 0 ->
  688: 					ok
  689: 				end
  690: 			end;
  691: 		    Other ->
  692: 			?dbg("Got garbage: ~p",[Other]),
  693: 			exit(Other)
  694: 		end
  695: 	end,
  696: 
  697:     spawn_link(Fun),
  698:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  699: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  700: 		   "MboxLinkUnlink",
  701: 		   [erlang:get_cookie(),node()]).
  702: 
  703: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  704: kill_erl_proc_from_java(doc) ->
  705:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  706:      "Test that mbox.exit(pid, new OtpErlangAtom(\"kill\") causes erlang "
  707:      "processes <pid> to be killed, even if trapping exits"];
  708: kill_erl_proc_from_java(suite) ->
  709:     [];
  710: kill_erl_proc_from_java(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  711:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  712: 		      process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  713: 		      link(Mbox),
  714: 		      Mbox ! {?kill_erl_proc_from_java, self()},
  715: 		      receive after infinity -> ok end
  716: 	      end,
  717:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,kill_erl_proc_from_java,killed,Config).
  718: 
  719: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  720: kill_mbox_from_erlang(doc) ->
  721:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  722:      "Test that exit(Mbox,kill) causes linked the Mbox to be killed, and"
  723:      "linked processes to exit with reason 'killed', even if trapping exits"];
  724: kill_mbox_from_erlang(suite) ->
  725:     {skip, "Not yet implemented"};
  726: kill_mbox_from_erlang(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  727:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  728: 		      link(Mbox),
  729: 		      Mbox ! {?kill_mbox_from_erlang},
  730: 		      exit(Mbox,kill),
  731: 		      receive after infinity -> ok end
  732: 	      end,
  733:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,kill_mbox_from_erlang,killed,Config).
  734: 
  735: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  736: erl_exit_with_reason_any_term(doc) ->
  737:     ["MboxLinkUnlink.java: "
  738:      "Test that any erlang term can be used as exit reason when erlang "
  739:      "process exits and is linked to an mbox."];
  740: erl_exit_with_reason_any_term(suite) ->
  741:     [];
  742: erl_exit_with_reason_any_term(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  743:     Reason = [hei,self(),{this,is,"a",[different,"reason"]}],
  744:     LinkFun = fun(Mbox) ->
  745: 		      link(Mbox),
  746: 		      Mbox ! {?erl_exit_with_reason_any_term,self(),Reason},
  747: 		      receive ok -> ok end,
  748: 		      exit(Reason)
  749: 	      end,
  750:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,erl_exit_with_reason_any_term,Reason,Config).
  751:

  859: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  860: %%% INTERNAL FUNCTIONS
  861: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  862: send_receive(TestCaseTag,Fun,Config) ->
  863:     spawn(fun() ->
  864: 		  register(erl_send_receive_server,self()),
  865: 		  receive
  866: 		      From when is_pid(From) ->
  867: 			  JavaNode = node(From),
  868: 			  [JavaNode] = nodes(hidden),
  869: 			  From ! {TestCaseTag,self()},
  870: 			  Fun(),
  871: 			  unregister(erl_send_receive_server)
  872: 		  end
  873: 	  end),
  874:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  875: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  876: 		   "MboxSendReceive",
  877: 		   [erlang:get_cookie(),node()]).
  878: 
  879: 
  880: internal_link_unlink(Tag,Msg,Config) ->
  881:     Fun =
  882: 	fun() ->
  883: 		register(erl_link_server,self()),
  884: 		process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  885: 		receive
  886: 		    {Main,Mbox} when is_pid(Main), is_pid(Mbox) ->
  887: 			?dbg("Erlang sending \"~p\"",[Msg]),
  888: 			Mbox ! {Tag,self(),?link_test_reason},
  889: 			receive done -> Main ! done end;
  890: 		    Other ->
  891: 			?dbg("Got garbage: ~p",[Other]),
  892: 			exit(Other)
  893: 		end
  894: 	end,
  895: 
  896:     spawn_link(Fun),
  897:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  898: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  899: 		   "MboxLinkUnlink",
  900: 		   [erlang:get_cookie(),node()]).
  901: 
  902: 
  903: erl_java_link(LinkFun,Msg,Config) ->
  904:     erl_java_link(LinkFun,Msg,?link_test_reason,Config).
  905: 
  906: erl_java_link(LinkFun,Msg,Reason,Config) ->
  907:     Fun =
  908: 	fun() ->
  909: 		register(erl_link_server,self()),
  910: 		process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  911: 		receive
  912: 		    {Main,Mbox} when is_pid(Mbox), is_pid(Mbox) ->
  913: 			?dbg("Erlang sending \"~p\"",[Msg]),
  914: 			Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> LinkFun(Mbox) end),
  915: 			receive
  916: 			    {'EXIT',Pid,Reason} ->
  917: 				receive done -> Main ! done end
  918: 			after 1000 ->
  919: 				receive
  920: 				    Other ->
  921: 					?dbg("Got garbage when waiting for exit:"
  922: 					     " ~p", [Other]),
  923: 					Main ! done,
  924: 					exit({got_unexpected,Other})
  925: 				after 0 ->
  926: 					ok
  927: 				end
  928: 			end;
  929: 		    Other ->
  930: 			?dbg("Got garbage: ~p",[Other]),
  931: 			exit(Other)
  932: 		end
  933: 	end,
  934: 
  935:     spawn_link(Fun),
  936:     ok = jitu:java(?config(java, Config),
  937: 		   ?config(data_dir, Config),
  938: 		   "MboxLinkUnlink",
  939: 		   [erlang:get_cookie(),node()]).
  940: 
  941: erl_status_server(List) ->
  942:     register(erl_status_server,self()),
  943:     erl_status_server(List,undefined).
  944: erl_status_server([{opt,{Tag,NodeName,Up}},{Tag2,NodeName2,Up2}|Rest],_) ->
  945:     receive
  946: 	{Tag,Node,Up,From} = M ->
  947: 	    ?dbg("erl_status_server got: ~p",[M]),
  948: 	    true = lists:prefix(NodeName,Node),
  949: 	    erl_status_server([{Tag2,NodeName2,Up2}|Rest],From);
  950: 	{Tag2,Node2,Up2,From2} = M2 ->
  951: 	    ?dbg("erl_status_server got: ~p",[M2]),
  952: 	    true = lists:prefix(NodeName2,Node2),
  953: 	    erl_status_server(Rest,From2)
  954:     end;
  955: erl_status_server([{Tag,NodeName,Up}|Rest],_) ->
  956:     receive
  957: 	{Tag,Node,Up,From} = M ->
  958: 	    ?dbg("erl_status_server got: ~p",[M]),
  959: 	    true = lists:prefix(NodeName,Node),
  960: 	    erl_status_server(Rest,From);
  961: 	Other ->
  962: 	    ?dbg("erl_status_server got garbage: ~p",[Other]),
  963: 	    exit(Other)
  964:     end;
  965: erl_status_server([],From) ->
  966:     From ! done.
  967: 
  968: spin_wait_until(Fun) ->
  969:     case Fun() of
  970:         true -> ok;
  971:         _ -> spin_wait_until(Fun)
  972:     end.
  973:             
  974:
